actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from taxation certain trusts established for the benefit of parents or handicapped relatives, and to provide a deduction for contributions to such trusts.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to establish a tax-exempt trust for the care of the parents and handicapped dependents of the taxpayer. Allows a $3,000 income tax deduction for contributions to such a trust.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from taxation certain trusts established for the benefit of parents or handicapped relatives, and to provide a deduction for contributions to such trusts.
